alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex; Western Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 10:58PM EST until December 26 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. A coating to 2 inches of snow possible mainly in north central and northeast Massachusetts. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Much of the northern half of Massachusetts away from the immediate coast. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads may be slippery. This is especially true across north central and northeast Massachusetts, where light rain and spotty freezing drizzle this evening may change to a period of snow after midnight. A coating to 2 inches of snow is possible before the precipitation comes to an end by daybreak.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex; Western Franklin
